main.game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by alecsiikaluoma on 18.9.2018. Represents the board. It contains moves and pieces.

        public void executeMove(Move move)
        Executes the given move. Checks all the necessary things like if the move is en passant or castling.
        Parameters:
        move - Move to be executed

      • generateAllMoves

        public ArrayList<Move> generateAllMoves(boolean color)
        Generates all possible moves and checks if these can be really performed so that they don't create an attack on king.

      • generateAllPseudoLegalMoves

        public ArrayList<Move> generateAllPseudoLegalMoves(boolean color)
        Generates all seemingly legal moves. It doesn't check if move creates a check to save computation power. If computer chooses a move that creates check it gets punished because it looses the king e.g a high value pice so we don't need to check for this, which makes the move generation faster.
        Returns:
        List of moves

      • move

        public boolean move(Move move)
        Moves the piece.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
